text: Eduardo Rodrigues dos Santos de Deus Junior (born 8 October 1995) is a Brazilian specialising in the high hurdles. He won a bronze medal at the 2019 Pan American Games. His personal bests are 13.30 seconds in the 110 metres hurdles (+0.7 m/s, La Chaux-de-Fonds 2019) and 7.78 seconds in the 60 metres hurdles (São Caetano do Sul 2018). ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2013 |rowspan=2|South American Junior Championships |rowspan=2|Montevideo, Uruguay |bgcolor=silver|2nd |110 m hurdles (99 cm) |13.84 (w) |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m hurdles |53.78 |- |2014 |South American U23 Championships |Montevideo, Uruguay |bgcolor=silver|2nd |110 m hurdles |13.85 (w) |- |2016 |Ibero-American Championships |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |bgcolor=silver|2nd |110 m hurdles |13.56 |- |2017 |South American Championships |Asunción, Paraguay |bgcolor=gold|1st |110 m hurdles |13.42 (w) |- |2018 |South American Games |Cochabamba, Bolivia |bgcolor=gold|1st |110 m hurdles |13.44 |- |rowspan=4|2019 |rowspan=2|South American Championships |rowspan=2|Lima, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |110 m hurdles |13.68 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 100 m relay |39.91 |- |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |110 m hurdles |13.48 |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |32nd (h) |110 m hurdles |13.92 |- |2020 |South American Indoor Championships |Cochabamba, Bolivia |bgcolor=silver|2nd |60 m hurdles |7.81 |} ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male hurdlers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games athletes for Brazil Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Brazil
title: Eduardo de Deus
